dcterms:description: The SenWave dataset aggregated over 105 million tweets and Weibo messages on COVID-19 in six distinct languages, featuring 10,000 English and 10,000 Arabic tweets tagged across 10 specific sentiment categories, along with 21,173 Weibo posts categorized into 7 different sentiment types for Mandarin.
dcterms:title: SenWave dataset

dcterms:creator: A. KHAROSEKAR
dcterms:description: The Guardian newspaper dataset comprises approximately 150,000 news articles from 2016 to 2023, focusing on various topics including COVID-19, partitioned into pre-pandemic and during-pandemic intervals for sentiment analysis.
dcterms:title: The Guardian newspaper dataset
